summary: SummaryHighlightsClean IngredientsSustainable PackagingThe COSRX Advanced Snail Mucin Gel Cleanser is sulfate-free and lightly foams to rinse away dirt, oil, and makeup without disrupting your skin's essential moisture barrier.
details: DetailsBenefitsContains hyper-concentrated snail mucin to hydrate and replenish skinRemoves impurities without stripping the skin of moistureThoroughly rinses away makeup, dirt, and oil to give your skin a fresh startKey IngredientsSnail Secretion Filtrate: A natural moisturizing ingredient rich in nutrients like zinc, allantoin, copper peptides and growth factors that support smoother, firmer, healthier-looking skinArginine: An amino acid that helps protect the skin against aging free radicalsFormulated WithoutParabensPhthalatesAlcoholItem 2577466How To UseWet your face and lather a pea size amount of cleanser between your palms. Massage the foam into your skin from forehead to jaw. Rinse thoroughly with warm water.Precautions: For external use only. Avoid the eye area.IngredientsWater, Acrylates Copolymer, Butylene Glycol, Glycerin, Disodium Laureth Sulfosuccinate, Sodium Cocoyl Isethionate, 1,2-hexanediol, Coco-glucoside, Lauryl Betaine, Snail Secretion Filtrate, Arginine, Tromethamine, Potassium Cocoyl Glycinate, Fragrance, Carbomer, Sodium Chloride, Ethylhexylglycerin, Acrylates/c10-30 Alkyl Acrylate Crosspolymer, Sodium Polyacrylate, Disodium EDTA.Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: Wet your face and lather a pea size amount of cleanser between your palms. Massage the foam into your skin from forehead to jaw. Rinse thoroughly with warm water.Precautions: For external use only. Avoid the eye area.

reviews.headline: A little goes a LONG way
reviews.comments: I use the COSRX Snail Mucin Cleanser, Power Essence Serum, Eye Cream, and All In One Cream, combined with a Mario Badescu toner and a multitude of The Ordinary treatments to form a personalized and highly effective skin care regimen that has made my skin look and feel tighter, firmer, healthier, and younger. On days when I'm in a rush, the Snail Mucin line is my go-to and is effective on its own, but combined with a few Ordinary products, it's the most amazing skin care regimen I have ever used. This is the best cleanser I have used since the Arbonne RE9 line which is very expensive and difficult to find. I was very skeptical at first, but I've been thrilled with this cleanser, and it only takes a tiny bit and lasts forever.

reviews.headline: Broke out
reviews.comments: Wasnt for me. I developed at least ten zits after three days of use

reviews.headline: Skin barrier
reviews.comments: I was so excited to used this product unfortunately it messed my skin barrier real bad

reviews.headline: This is my all time favorite cleanser
reviews.comments: I recently switched to this cleanser not long ago. At the time I was using a different snail mucin cleanser. It was soothing, sure, but didn't have enough cleansing power. I needed something more potent. Then I got the mini version of this for christmas. I loved it, my skin cleared up. I use this after the micellar water from the same brand and it works wonders without stripping the skin.

reviews.headline: Soothing Cleanser
reviews.comments: I love this cleanser. It feels good on my face and gives me a natural glow.

reviews.headline: I think it's decent
reviews.comments: I got a mini one of these in a free sample bag. I ended up buying a full size one. it foams up nicely which I think is a big deal lol. I don't trust cleansers that don't get foamy. it does has a very strong earthy smell to it, but I'm not bothered by fragrances. it does the job. skin feels smooth and clean after.

reviews.headline: Unexpected great cleanser
reviews.comments: I received a sample of this with another purchase. I love the smell. It is pretty concentrated which I also like and my skin felt really good after using it and not dry. I also believe it did a good job of cleaning my skin.

reviews.headline: COSRX Advanced Snail Mucin Gel Cleanser
reviews.comments: The COSRX Advanced Snail Mucin Gel Cleanser is amazing! It leaves my skin feeling clean, hydrated, and super soft without stripping it. The gentle formula works perfectly for my sensitive skin, and the snail mucin adds a nice boost of hydration and glow. It's a great addition to any skincare routine. Highly recommend!

reviews.headline: Smells like cheap dish soap
reviews.comments: I love all of the Cosrx snail mucin products and bought this without reading any reviews or researching. I've been using Missha super aqua cell renew snail cleanser for years and it's my favorite affordable hydrating cleanser. I won't be returning the Cosrx, but I doubt I will repurchase, solely because it smells like cheap dish soap to me and is unpleasant to use. It works fine, leaves my skin feeling hydrating and clean, but the smell is just off-putting for me and cheapens it. Pros: texture, hydration, lather, and no allergic reaction. Cons: price and smell

reviews.headline: If you have gentle skin this is perfect!!
reviews.comments: Im always skeptical buying cleansers but I love their snail 92 gel for a moisturizer and i absolutely love this cleanser. It doesnt burn my face or dry it out like every other cleanser ive used. It doesnt have a smell. Its an amazing price for what you get because I only use a pea sized amount (they always say to use a pea sized amount but this time its fr)

reviews.headline: Really like this odd cleanser
reviews.comments: I received this in a sample box and loved it.  If you can get past the snail mucin part, it is a very gel like product and smooths on your skin which makes it feel moisturizing as it dissolves your makeup.  It also has a pleasing odor.  The price point is also great for how much product you get and it takes very little to take off your makeup (and I wear a lot of product).

reviews.headline: Worth the wait
reviews.comments: When I first started using this product it broke me out. I thought about stopping use but kept using the product holding onto hope that i'm breaking out because its just really getting in them pores. Yup. I've been using this product as the second step of my double cleans twice a day and ya'll my skin is so clear. I use other products too so i'm not giving this product all the credit to my results but it's now a staple product because it cleans VERY good but is so gentle on the skin. And the scent is a light refreshing citrus!

reviews.headline: HG status for dry sensitive skin
reviews.comments: Everyone talks about the essence but this is my favorite from the snail line. This is the only non-cream based cleanser that works for me.  I'm in my 40s and my skin very prone to dryness and redness.  this cleanser doesn't strip it, the way the cosrx low pH one did, and doesn't irritate my face. It still leaves my face feeling clean, which isn't always the case with the mold lotion like cleansers.

reviews.headline: Mucin Cleanser
reviews.comments: I've only used this twice but I really like it. It is very light and leaves my skin so smooth and clear. When I apply it, it doesn't leave a burning sensation. I would definitely buy again.

reviews.headline: Had to stop using
reviews.comments: I bought this thinking it would be very nice but upon using a few times realized how oily my skin was getting minutes after using

reviews.headline: I absolutely LOVE this cleanser!
reviews.comments: It does not dry out my face, and a little goes a long way. I love how soft my face feels after using this cleanser.

reviews.headline: really like this product
reviews.comments: I really like this cleanser! It is gentle but seems to clean well.

reviews.headline: It's a Yes, From Me, Dawg!
reviews.comments: Love this product. So cost friendly, and a solid choice in face cleansers. This leaves my skin soft and hydrated, and if followed by the serum, i immediately have the most perfect dewy glow. No down-sidesâ€”try this cleanser!

reviews.headline: I've been buying this product since 2021!
reviews.comments: GLASS SKIN is what u get from using this product and using this brand.

reviews.headline: AMAZING!
reviews.comments: I have dry skin with redness and texture around my jaw line. This product helped smooth out that textured area and left my skin feeling so hydrated. This cleanser in addition to other COSRX snail mucin products gave helped me have such smooth skin. Worth every penny!

faceoff_positive.comments: I use this product for both morning and night. I really love it and I have bought now about 3 or 4 of these products. I will continue to buy this product for the foreseeable future. It is first a gel-type consistency but when you lather it up it becomes a bit foamy. I really like it for both my morning and night routine. This is something I would use all the time and it is really affordable! I am really glad Ulta has this product available to grab and go. People have been hyping this brand up so definitely been stocking up with these products. I like to have two of these products on hand. 1) I am currently using and 2) is the one I will use once I'm finished with the other bottle. So I know I will never run out of a cleanser for my skincare routine.
faceoff_positive.headline: Really love!

faceoff_negative.comments:
I love the Snail 92 cream and several other toners and essences from CosRX, but never tried out the cleanser, and as I needed to cleanse my face more often this season and begin a morning cleanse I thought this would be perfect to try out for both times of day.
The fragrance is beautiful and feels so clean, and the texture is a viscous gel like formula, and just needs to be mixed with a little water to begin turning into a nice hydrating foamy lather (not a drying or undetectably light airy foam) which feels great to spread around the face and neck. I felt like this was really going to clear my skin because of how nicely it felt like it spread on the skin.
Unfortunately this is not actually good at its one job - cleaning the skin. I have tried using an oil cleanser before this cleanser, going in 3 times with this cleanser, and even tried leaving it on for several minutes  - but nothing makes this cleanser actually able to remove every bit of makeup on the eyes and skin. You see the foundation dripping from the skin each rinse, and the skin becomes oily feeling each rinse in the process as it just cannot grab onto and clear makeup as well as it needs to.
Every time I have tried using this after wearing makeup, I cannot get every last bit of lipstick, foundation, eyeliner, or mascara off, nor a tinted SPF which is not supposed to even be a long lasting product. I cannot rely on this to take off the day even when I am makeup free as I need to guarantee every active on my skin is coming off before I go in with my other skin products.
Every time I used this, my skin didn't feel perfectly cleaned and cleared, it just wasn't leaving it as refreshed as my best cleansers do, even if my skin felt really soft after. My skin didn't show any signs of looking irritated when using this so I don't think the fragrance is bad for people with sensitive and acne prone skin. But I am going to be setting this aside to only be used as a morning cleanser after days I did not wear makeup the day before until I simply decide I don't want it anymore and throw it out. I can't gift this to anyone who wears makeup either as this is useless for them too.
I like enough products by this brand that I don't think I will stop using anything else I've enjoyed by them because of this, but as this is the 2nd product I do not enjoy by them, I will just be sticking to what I like rather than try to experiment with anything else now.
faceoff_negative.headline: Leaves skin soft but not good at cleansing
